Package com.jmill29.tvtrackerapi.service

Class UserWatchHistoryServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.jmill29.tvtrackerapi.service.UserWatchHistoryServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserWatchHistoryService
@Service public class UserWatchHistoryServiceImpl extends Object implements UserWatchHistoryService
Service implementation for user watch history operations. Handles business logic and exception translation for watch history features.

  • Method Details

    • addShowToWatchHistory

      public boolean addShowToWatchHistory(UserWatchHistoryRequest userWatchHistoryRequest, String username) throws IllegalArgumentException, DatabaseException, WatchHistoryAlreadyExistsException, ShowNotFoundException
      Adds a show to the user's watch history.

      Validates the request and username, checks for duplicates, and ensures the show exists in the database.

      Specified by:
      addShowToWatchHistory in interface UserWatchHistoryService
      Parameters:
      userWatchHistoryRequest - the request containing the show ID to add
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      true if the show was successfully added to the watch history
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the request is null or username is invalid
      DatabaseException - if a database error occurs
      WatchHistoryAlreadyExistsException - if the show is already in the user's watch history
      ShowNotFoundException - if the show ID does not match any entry in the database Implementation Note: This method now throws ShowNotFoundException if the provided show ID does not exist in the database.

    • getWatchHistoryByUserId

      public List<UserWatchHistoryResponse> getWatchHistoryByUserId(int userId, boolean getAll) throws IllegalArgumentException, DatabaseException, WatchHistoryNotFoundException
      Retrieves the watch history for a specific user by user ID.
      Specified by:
      getWatchHistoryByUserId in interface UserWatchHistoryService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      getAll - whether to retrieve all shows or only those with a watch history entry
      Returns:
      a list of UserWatchHistoryResponse objects representing the user's watch history
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input is invalid
      DatabaseException - if a database access error occurs
      WatchHistoryNotFoundException - if no watch history is found for the user

    • updateWatchStatus

      public boolean updateWatchStatus(UserWatchHistoryRequest userWatchHistoryRequest, String username) throws IllegalArgumentException, DatabaseException, WatchHistoryNotFoundException
      Updates the watch status of a show in the user's watch history.
      Specified by:
      updateWatchStatus in interface UserWatchHistoryService
      Parameters:
      userWatchHistoryRequest - the request object containing the updated watch status
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input is invalid
      DatabaseException - if a database access error occurs
      WatchHistoryNotFoundException - if the watch history entry does not exist

    • deleteShowFromWatchHistory

      public boolean deleteShowFromWatchHistory(String username, int showId) throws IllegalArgumentException, DatabaseException, WatchHistoryNotFoundException
      Deletes a show from the user's watch history.
      Specified by:
      deleteShowFromWatchHistory in interface UserWatchHistoryService
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      showId - the ID of the show to delete
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input is invalid
      DatabaseException - if a database access error occurs
      WatchHistoryNotFoundException - if the watch history entry does not exist

    • isShowInWatchHistory

      public boolean isShowInWatchHistory(String username, int showId) throws IllegalArgumentException, DatabaseException
      Checks whether a show is already in the user's watch history.
      Specified by:
      isShowInWatchHistory in interface UserWatchHistoryService
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      showId - the ID of the show
      Returns:
      true if the show exists in the watch history, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if input is invalid
      DatabaseException - if a database access error occurs

    • getWatchHistoryByUsername

      Retrieves the watch history for a specific user by username.
      Specified by:
